jobDescription: Campus Management is looking for a highly skilled Technical Analyst with a strong background in building top-quality scalable, predictable, and high-performance solutions using SQL. The Technical Analyst will be responsible for building and maintaining internal and external facing solutions using procedures, scripts, reports, and DTS/SSIS packages. Will work with a team of experienced analysts, architects, and developers to build enterprise-level data migration and conversion solutions, custom data deliverables, and integration solutions. Candidate must have excellent analytical skills, as well as solid database experience. Interact closely with other Technical Analyst/Architects/Implementation Consultants to understand requirements and design solutionsAssist Architects with providing estimates for solutions.Provide support and assistance for customer escalations and issues, including off-hours, as needed.Effectively multi-task with many projects consistentlyResponsible for quality and accountability of deliverablesPrioritize and schedule assignments to meet project deadlines and goalsShare knowledge through knowledge-sharing presentations.Participate in a small, experienced, energetic teamDesign, develop and maintain solutions.Comfortable with direct communication with all levels of technical and business resources both internal and external.Interact well with team members while maintaining multiple priorities in an extremely dynamic environment, initiating necessary tasks and ensuring complete follow through.All other responsibilities as assigned.Bachelor’s degree or higher in CS, CIS preferred4+ years’ experience in application development using Microsoft SQL Server2+ years’ experience in SSRS.Must have experience completing enterprise data migrations/conversions from one system to another system as a part of the implementation.Solid understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle phases utilizing waterfall or agile methodologies.Experience in identifying and documenting requirements through direct communication with the customerExperience working with TFSExperience debugging and optimizing existing SQL scriptsSolid knowledge of SQL Server 2016, Azure SQL Database with the development of complex stored procedures, views and other SQL objectsPerformance tuning, code profiling, code review, hands-on experience using Best PracticesA resource with C#, ASP.NET, ADO.NET would be a bonus; interest in learning new technologies is requiredKnowledge of Microsoft PowerBI and/or Microsoft Dynamics AX is beneficialKnowledge of Higher Education, Student Information Systems, CRM Systems is a plusStrong oral and written communication skills and strong organizational skills are essentialProficient in MS Office products including Word, Excel, Outlook, Outlook, and VisioGood understanding and experience on Enterprise migration Patterns for B2BMicrosoft Certification preferred
